message.name: ERR_TEMPLATE_FV_NAME_BLANK
message.locale: A template name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TEMPLATE_FV_NAME_EXISTS
message.locale: A template with this name already exists. The template name must be unique.

message.name: ERR_TEMPLATE_FV_GOAL_BLANK
message.locale: The goal must not be blank.

message.name: ERR_TEMPLATE_FV_CANCELED
message.locale: This service plan template has already been canceled.
This service plan template has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_TEMPLATE_FV_CANCELED_NO_MODIFY
message.locale: This service plan template is canceled and cannot be modified.
This service plan template is cancelled and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_TEMPLATE_XRV_ASSIGNED_TO_SERVICEPLAN
message.locale: This template is assigned to at least one service plan and cannot be cancelled.
This template is assigned to at least one service plan and cannot be canceled.

message.name: ERR_TEMPLATE_XRV_SUB_GOALS_EXIST
message.locale: The goal cannot be modified as one or more sub-goals have been added to the template.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_TEMPLATE_APPR_CRIT_NOT_ASSOCIATED
message.locale: No Approval Criteria have been associated with this particular plan item.

message.name: ERR_PLAN_TEMPLATE_APPR_CRIT_ALL_ASSOCIATED
message.locale: All possible approval criteria that have been configured for this plan item have been added.
